DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , control trial test use educational video newborn well-child visit . Parents watch video medical visit compare parent receive traditional paper handout . Measures obtain baseline 2-week follow-up include knowledge infant development , self-efficacy infant care , problem-solving skill .
DOC.criteria: Baby 's first visit pediatric office Baby > 1 month old Parent/Caregiver < 18yrs old Inability understand English No access work telephone
